descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]


[heading]Preface[/heading]
Sorry.I don't speak English. I'm relying on machine translation.
Please forgive my poor English.
If somebody corrects my poor English, it's great help.

[heading]Features[/heading]
[size=2]This mod adds 45 new dragons[/size]. [u][b]make a change to ｌeveledlist.[/b][/u][b][u] vanilla Dragons does not appear.[/u][/b]
And, [size=2]make changes to the Named Dragons.([/size]Later)
The dragon use various elemental Shout.
[color=#ff7700]Fire[/color],[color=#cfe2f3]Frost[/color],[color=#d9ead3]Poison[/color],[color=#ffe599]Lightning[/color],[color=#B45F06][color=#ffffff][color=#9fc5e8]Water[/color],[/color]Rock[/color],Wind,[color=#ff0000]Blood[/color],[color=#fce5cd]Sun[/color],[color=#9fc5e8][color=#e69138]Acid[/color][/color]...etc.
These is very flashy and powerful. and this is not lore friendly.


--------------

[size=2]A major feature of this MOD...
[b]
1.[/b]This Mod Dragons Attack does not give damage to the People.
But the people cannot often act by the attack of the dragons.(by fear, paralysis, blow away effect)

[b]In addition, the people are hardly given damage except the magic to a dragon.[/b]
in other words...
[color=#ea9999][u]The dragon is not killed by people, and the people are not killed by a dragon.[/u][/color]

[/size]*[size=2][size=2]Player and bandit and animal and creatures receive damage.[/size]

2.The dragons of this MOD have some items.
Unique scales,blood,poison,meat,heart...etc.
These will help in the fight against the dragon.

3.Make changes to the Named Dragons.
Changed Dragons[b]
[color=#d9ead3]Mirmulnir[/color]
[color=#c9daf8]Sahloknir[/color][/b]
[b][b][color=#f9cb9c]Viinturuth[/color][/b]
[/b][color=#a2c4c9][b]Vuljotnaak[/b][/color]
[b][b][color=#d5a6bd]Nahagliiv[/color][/b]
[color=#b4a7d6]Vulthuryol[/color][/b][/size][color=#b4a7d6]
[/color]
[u]You can get power to summon them by defeating them.[/u]
[size=2]Other name dragons does not change.[/size]

[heading]Installation[/heading]

[u][color=#ffe599][size=3]This Mod is required DLC1 Dawnguard and DLC3 Dragonborn[/size][/color][color=#ffe599][size=3].[/size][/color][size=3]

[/size][/u]This mod changed leveled list of dragons.
[color=#ea9999][u]Therefore this mod conflict with other dragon mod.[/u][/color]

after install/uninstall, recommend new game.
If you do not begin with the new game, a change may not be reflected well.

[heading]Known Bugs & Issues[/heading]

・The problem that NPCs dies by the fall from the high place.(NPC does not
cause the damage by the attack of the dragon. but receives the fall
damage)
・The problem that the weather which the dragon changed is not restored
This problem will be resolved by the console command or Scroll of Weather(A dragon has this Scroll.）

↓↓↓Change weather console command↓↓↓
fw 10e1f2

[heading]Item List[/heading]

[color=#f6b26b]Equipment [color=#ffffff](Armor Slot 60)[/color][/color]
Lesser Dragon Scale - Improves the armor rating by 50 points. Health is increased by 25 points.
Elder Dragon Scale - Improves the armor rating by 100 points. Health is increased by 50 points.
Ancient Dragon Scale - Improves the armor rating by 150 points. Health is increased by 100 points.
Legendary Dragon Scale - Time between shouts is reduced 15%.
Dragon Scale - Carrying capacity increases by 50 point.
Flame Dragon Scale - Resist 25% of fire damage.
Ice Dragon Scale - Resist 25% of frost damage.
Thunder Dragon Scale - Resist 25% of shock damage.
Green Dragon Scale - Resist 33% of poison damage.
Wind Dragon Scale - 20% of move speed rises.
Earth Dragon Scale - Reduce the falling damage 90%.
Aqua Dragon Scale - Walk on the surface of water.
Iron Dragon Scale - Ignores 80% of all physical damage for 30 seconds.
Illusion Dragon Scale - All Illusion spells work on higher level people. (+10 levels to the spell maximum)
Spriggan Dragon Scale - 100% resistant to disease. Animals will neither attack nor flee from you.
Invisible Dragon Scale - You are 50% harder to detect.
Mystic Dragon Scale - Magicka is increased by <mag> points. but stamina down 100 point.
Dragon Lich Scale - You can have three reanimated zombies. Conjuration spells cost 20% less to cast.
Oblivion Dragon Scale -You can have two atronachs or reanimated zombies. Conjuration spells cost <mag>% less to cast.
Red Dragon Scale - Resist 40% of Fire damage. Fire Breath shout deals 50% more damage.
Sunlight Dragon Scale - During the day, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
Eclipse Dragon Scale - During the night, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
Lake Dragon Stone - Can swim underwater without drowning. Stamina is increased by 100 points.
Serpentine Dragon Stone - Resist 50% of poison damage. Alteration spells last <mag>% longer.
Black Dragon Talon - Attack damage 25% rises.
White Dragon Talon - Destruction spells do 25% more damage.
Inferno Gem - Increases Fire Resistance by 30%. Fire spells do 30% more damage.
Ice Gem - Increases Frost Resistance by <mag>%. Frost spells do 30% more damage.
Thunder Gem - Increases Shock Resistance by <mag>%. Shock spells do 25% more damage.
Cobalt Gem  - Resist <mag>% of magic Absorb 15% of the magicka from hostile spells.
Elemental Gem - fire,frost,shock spells do 50% more damage.
Melt Dragon's Core - Fire Breath shout deals 100% more damage.

[color=#ffe599]Food[/color]
Dragon Meat　- For 24 hours,Health and Stamina regenerates 50% faster.
Grilled Dragon Meat - For 24 hours,Health and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
Dragon Marbled Meat - For 24 hours, Health is increased by 100 points.
Dragon Heart - Add one perk point.

[color=#ea9999]Potion[/color]
Dragon Blood(Low)  - Restore Health,Stamina,Magicka. and Time between shouts is reduced 10%
Dragon Blood(Medium) - Restore Health,Stamina,Magicka. and Time between shouts is reduced 15%
Dragon Blood(High) -  Restore Health,Stamina,Magicka. and Time between shouts is reduced 20%
Fire Blood - For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of Fire damage. Fire spells do <30>% more damage.
Frost Blood - For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of Frost damage. Frost spells do <30>% more damage.
Thunder Blood - For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of shock damage. shock spells do <30>% more damage.
Dragon Rock Skin Potion - Improves the caster's armor rating by 250 points for 60 seconds.
Iron Dragon's Blood -　Improves the caster's armor rating by 500 points for 60 seconds.
Dragon Scale Potion -　ignores 80% of all physical damage for 30 seconds.

[color=#b6d7a8]Poison[/color]
Dragon's poison(Green) - Causes 10 points of poison damage for 10 seconds.
Dragon's poison(Cyan) - Drains the target's Magicka by 50 points per second for 15 seconds.
Dragon's Venom - Causes 20 points of poison damage for 10 seconds.
Dragon's Paralysis Poison - Target is paralyzed for 7 seconds, Target is 100% weaker to poison damage for 7 seconds.
Dragon's Acid Poison - Down armor rating 500 points for 15 seconds.
Dragon's Corrosive Poison - Causes 50 points of poison damage for 5 seconds.
Dragon's Oil - Target is 100% weaker to fire damage for 30 seconds.
[color=#c9daf8]
[color=#ffffff][color=#c9daf8]Scrolls[/color]
Scroll of Weather - Change Weather.
Apocrypha Conjure Book　- [/color][/color]For 24 hours, Summons a Creatures of Apocrypha permanently.
Magic Sand - For 24 hours, Summons a Sand Atronachs permanently.
Skull Dragon's Ash - [color=#c9daf8][color=#ffffff]For 24 hours, Summons a Skeletons permanently.[/color]
[/color]

Equipment List (Armour Slot – 60):             Dragon Scales: -          [b]Lesser Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 50 points and Health is increased by 25 points.
 -          [b]Elder Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 100 points and Health is increased by 50 points. -          [b]Ancient Dragon Scales[/b] - Improves armour rating by 150 points and Health is increased by 100 points. -          [b]Legendary Dragon Scales[/b] - Time between Shouts is reduced by 15%.
 -          [b]Dragon Scales[/b] - Carrying Capacity is increased by 50 points.
 -          [b]Flame Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 25% of Fire Damage.
 -          [b]Ice Dragon Scales [/b]- Resist 25% of Frost Damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 25% of Shock Damage.
 -          [b]Green Dragon Scales[/b] - Resist 33% of Poison Damage.
 -          [b]Wind Dragon Scales[/b] - Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
 -          [b]Earth Dragon Scales [/b]- Reduced Falling Damage by 90%.
 -          [b]Aqua Dragon Scales[/b] – Grants the ability to walk on water.
 -          [b]Iron Dragon Scales [/b]- Ignores 80% of all Physical Damage for 30 seconds.
 -          [b]Illusion Dragon Scales [/b]- All Illusion Spells can work people which are 10 levels higher than your current level. -          [b]Spriggan Dragon Scales[/b] – Grants 100% resistance to Diseases and animals will neither attack nor flee from you.
 -          [b]Invisible Dragon Scales[/b] - You become 50% harder to detect.
 -          [b]Mystic Dragon Scales[/b] - Magicka is increased by 100 points, but stamina down by a 100.
 -          [b]Dragon Lich Scales[/b] - You can have three reanimated zombies at once and Conjuration Spells cost 20% less to cast. 
 -          [b]Oblivion Dragon Scales[/b] -You can have two Atronachs/Reanimated zombies at once and Conjuration spells cost 30% less to cast.
 -          [b]Red Dragon Scales [/b]- Fire Damage Resistance is increased by 40% and the Fire Breath shout deals 50% more damage.
 -          [b]Sunlight Dragon Scales [/b]- During the day, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
 -          [b]Eclipse Dragon Scales[/b] - During the night, Health and Magicka and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
 -          [b]Lake Dragon Stone[/b] - Can swim underwater without drowning. Stamina is increased by 100 points.
 -          [b]Serpentine Dragon Stone [/b]- Resist 50% of poison damage. Alteration spells last <mag>% longer.
 -          [b]Black Dragon Talon[/b] - Attack damage is increased by 25%.
 -          [b]White Dragon Talon[/b] - Destruction spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Inferno Gem[/b] - Increases Fire Resistance by 30% and Fire spells do 30% more damage.
 -          [b]Ice Gem[/b] - Increases Frost Resistance by <mag>% and Frost spells do 30% more damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Gem[/b] - Increases Shock Resistance by <mag>% and Shock spells do 25% more damage.
 -          [b]Cobalt Gem[/b]  - Resist <mag>% of magic and Absorb 15% Magicka from enemies.
 -          [b]Elemental Gem [/b]- Fire, Frost and Shock spells do 50% more damage.
 -          [b]Melt Dragon's Core[/b] - Fire Breath shout deals 100% more damage. 

 Food[b]:[/b]
 -          [b]Dragon Meat[/b]　- For 24 hours, Health and Stamina regenerates 50% faster.
 -          [b]Grilled Dragon Meat[/b] - For 24 hours, Health and Stamina regenerates 100% faster.
 -          [b]Dragon Marbled Meat[/b] - For 24 hours, Health is increased by 100 points.
 -          [b]Dragon Heart[/b] - Adds one perk point.

 Potions:
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (Low)[/b]  - Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka and Time between Shouts is reduced 10%
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (Medium)[/b] – Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka. and Time between Shouts is reduced 15%
 -          [b]Dragon Blood (High)[/b] -  Restores Health, Stamina, Magicka. and Time between Shouts is reduced 20%
 -          [b]Fire Blood [/b]- For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of Fire damage and Fire spells do 30% more damage.
 -          [b]Frost Blood[/b] - For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of Frost damage and Frost spells do 30% more damage.
 -          [b]Thunder Blood[/b] - For 60 seconds, Resist 30% of Shock damage and Shock spells do 30% more damage.
 -          [b]Dragon Rock Skin Potion[/b] - Improves the caster's Armour rating by 250 points for 60 seconds.
 -          [b]Iron Dragon's Blood[/b] - Improves the caster's Armour rating by 500 points for 60 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon Scale Potion[/b] - Ignores 80% of all Physical damage for 30 seconds.

 Poisons:
 -          [b]Dragon's poison (Green)[/b] - Causes 10 points of poison damage for 10 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's poison (Cyan)[/b] - Drains the target's Magicka by 50 points for 15 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Venom[/b] - Causes 20 points of Poison damage for 10 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Paralysis Poison[/b] - Target is paralyzed for 7 seconds, and is 100% weaker to poison damage for 7 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Acid Poison[/b] - Decreases armour rating 500 points for 15 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Corrosive Poison[/b] - Causes 50 points of Poison damage for 5 seconds.
 -          [b]Dragon's Oil[/b] - Target is 100% weaker to Fire damage for 30 seconds.

 Scrolls:
 -          [b]Scroll of Weather[/b] - Changes the weather.
 -          [b]Apocrypha Conjure Book[/b] - Summons a Creatures of Apocrypha for 24 hours.
 -          [b]Magic Sand[/b] - Summons a Sand Atronach for 24 hours.
 -          [b]Skull Dragon's Ash[/b] - Summons a Skeleton for 24 hours.
